name: Cordyceps (chazzzz)
description:
Controls: 

  • Left-Click: Click or drag to select infected ants
  • Right-Click: Move infected ants to a location
  • Scroll Wheel: Zoom in and out
  • X: Sacrifice Bug: Sprout a large mushroom out of one of your infected bugs to deal a larger amount of infection to nearby enemies, at the cost of that bug

Ants will automatically start attacking an enemy right next to them. Infected ants will passively infect ants within their cloud of spores. If one ant is selected, the player can choose to "Sacrifice" that bug by pressing X. When this happens, the infected bug will die, and its remaining hp will be converted to spores that deal a potentially large amount of infection to nearby enemies. 

Ants will attack nearby enemies. Try to avoid killing too many enemies, because dead ants are of no use to you!

The game is over when either all ants are infected, or all your infected ants are dead. See how many infected ants you can keep alive!

Music  Credit: "Meditation Forest" by Jamendo: https://www.jamendo.com/track/1706218/meditation-forest

Known Issues:

  • bugs can get stuck when moving around
  • Dead bugs sometimes go into their walking animation
  • Sometimes bugs will stop attacking when they should be attacking
  • There is currently no way to reset the game when you reach a game over. You have to refresh the page
